text: La Bollène-Vésubie is a commune. It is found in the region Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur in the Alpes-Maritimes department in the south of France. The inhabitants there are called Bollénois. In 2006, about 561 people lived in this town. Category:Communes in Alpes-Maritimes
title: La Bollène-Vésubie
